articles.title: Revolution reveal ‘Independence Day’ jersey
articles.description:
New England begins the 2026 MLS regular season on Feb. 21.

The post Revolution reveal ‘Independence Day’ jersey appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: New England Revolution unveiled their new 'Independence Day' jersey for the 2026 season.
The MLS regular season starts on February 21, 2026, impacting local fans and businesses.
Local fans can purchase the new jersey to support the team during the upcoming season.

articles.title: About a dozen vehicles damaged by a bridge joint on I-91 in Western Mass.
articles.description:
State Police and MassDOT both responded to the scene, and the bridge joint was cut, officials say.

The post About a dozen vehicles damaged by a bridge joint on I-91 in Western Mass. appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: About a dozen vehicles were damaged by a bridge joint on I-91.
State Police and MassDOT responded to the incident on February 10.
The bridge joint was cut to prevent further damage to vehicles.

articles.title: North Andover officer shot by colleague argues judge is biased and should be removed
articles.description:
Lawyers for Kelsey Fitzsimmons allege that Judge Kathleen McCarthy-Neyman has “unclean hands.”

The post North Andover officer shot by colleague argues judge is biased and should be removed appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: North Andover officer Kelsey Fitzsimmons claims bias against Judge Kathleen McCarthy-Neyman.
Fitzsimmons' lawyers argue the judge has 'unclean hands' in the case.
Potential removal of the judge could affect ongoing legal proceedings in the area.

articles.title: Eli Lilly snaps up Watertown biotech in $2.4 billion deal
articles.description:
Orna Therapeutics, which engineers immune cells inside the body, will fold into one of the world’s largest drugmakers.

The post Eli Lilly snaps up Watertown biotech in $2.4 billion deal appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Eli Lilly acquires Watertown's Orna Therapeutics for $2.4 billion.
Orna specializes in engineering immune cells, enhancing local biotech innovation.
Deal may boost job opportunities in Boston's growing biotech sector.

articles.title: Boston man paroled after serving 16 years of life sentence for fatal stabbing outside bar
articles.description:
Corey Patterson, convicted of second-degree murder in a 2009 bar stabbing, was granted parole by the Massachusetts Parole Board in January.

The post Boston man paroled after serving 16 years of life sentence for fatal stabbing outside bar appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Corey Patterson was paroled after 16 years for a 2009 bar stabbing.
The Massachusetts Parole Board granted his release in January 2026.
Patterson's release raises concerns about public safety in Boston neighborhoods.

articles.title: ‘You’re going to feel the pain’: Kurt Warner’s advice to Drake Maye after losing Super Bowl LX
articles.description:
"You’re going to feel the pain. It’s going to be tough for a while. Then you step back and you’re able to celebrate what you were able to accomplish."

The post ‘You’re going to feel the pain’: Kurt Warner’s advice to Drake Maye after losing Super Bowl LX appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Kurt Warner advises Drake Maye on coping with Super Bowl LX loss.
Maye's team faced defeat in Super Bowl LX, impacting local fan morale.
Warner emphasizes the importance of celebrating achievements despite setbacks.
